first_para: Timothy James "Tim" Farron (born 27 May 1970) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Westmorland and Lonsdale. He was elected President of the Liberal Democrats in November 2010 and served from 1 January 2011 to 31 December 2014.

full.extract: Timothy James "Tim" Farron (born 27 May 1970) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He is Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Westmorland and Lonsdale. He was elected President of the Liberal Democrats in November 2010 and served from 1 January 2011 to 31 December 2014.
full.title: Tim Farron
